table.caption: Table 33 — Compatibility operators
head: Operands
Operator
Description
rows: (PDF 1.1) Begin a compatibility section. Unrecognised operators (along with their operands) is ignored without error until the balancing EX operator is encountered.
(PDF 1.1) End a compatibility section begun by a balancing BX operator. Ignore any unrecognised operands and operators from previous matching BX onward.
